p: To verify and quantify how much the EDW will affect QIC in the 21 st century, we present a comparison between the ELA SST and ELA atm at QIC, both bias-corrected and calculated based on equation ( 1), but using as input the FLH SST from equation ( 2), and FLH atm derived by interpolating Ta and Zg, respectively, from 16 CMIP5 models. The ERSST and ERA-interim reanalysis products were used as a control case.
